name: LINES!!! - THE IMPOSSIBLE GAME
description:
WELCOME TO LAZER HELL!!!

LINES!!! A hilariously (and frustratingly) hard game that you aren't able to win.
You wouldn't be able to survive 10 seconds LOL

BRIEF

The game itself is very simple to understand, but is very hard to master.
Enter a world full of bright killer lazers and see how much time it takes you to die!

HOW TO PLAY?

Move the circle with your mouse/touchscreen and don't let the lazers touch you!
And be very very careful! There is literally 200 lines on the screen!

Every wave of lazers happens every 5 seconds, The lazers will do nothing for the first 2 seconds and then KABOOM! They are active and they will make you nothing but dust!

Share us your score in the comments!!!

WHAT TOOLS DID YOU USED TO MAKE THIS?

The game is totally written in C and Raylib from scratch.

WHO MADE IT?

Rabia Alhaffar, With support from the great developers darltrash/ohnodario and user Anata from the Raylib Discord Server.

OTHER OPERATING SYSTEMS

Linux and Mac are also supported, Linux version coming very soon. Although i recommend compiling from source if you have Linux
You will require to install raylib and the latest C compiler.

Unfortunately, We need someone to compile game for Mac and send us binaries with resources folder in a ZIP archive because we don't own a Mac and we can't test it.

We are also working on porting this to Android and HTML5, No iOS support for now.

If you would like to contribute, Tell me in comments! ;)
